title: Car Technical Customization - Drift - Drag - Off-Road - and more!
description: Create your own custom car mode! Easily convert your car into drift, drag offroad or more.
longDescription:
CAR TECHNICAL CUSTOMIZATION COMPONENT - DEMO (150mb)
COMPATIBLE ALL CHAOS BASED CARS
ADD YOUR OWN CAR AND ENJOY!
  • Easily switch normal mode, drift mode, drag mode, off-road mode, and more!
  • Automatic save and load system for all cars
  • Create your own modes!
  • Wheel meshes scaleable!


🚀💎 A unique component that will power up your car games.

You can easily use this component by adding it to any chaos-based car.

Thanks to this component, you can easily convert your existing car into a drift car or drag car.

You can create your own modes and easily switch between these modes at runtime.

So you can switch from normal mode to drift mode and back to normal mode or a different mode.

You can even turn your own car into a go-kart car, off-road car with this component.

Because you can shrink or enlarge the wheels at runtime.

The automatic save and load system works in all cars.

So, if you have more than one car, each car is saved separately.

The component allows you to easily adjust and save many variables, from wheel size to torque power.

A total of 26 technical variable adjustment capabilities are available.
technicalDetails:
•  Add your own car and enjoy!
  •  Compatible all chaos based cars
  • Automatic save and load system for all cars
  • You can convert your current car into a drift car and easily switch between many modes.
  •  Your own car wheel meshes scaleable - Wheels should be mesh seperate from the body!
  • Sample modes ready! ( Normal, Drift, Drag, Off-Road, Crab, Mini Wheels, Monster )
  • Sample car ready

Number of Blueprints: 5

Input: Keyboard, Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

File Size: 20mb

Documentation: In Our Discord Server

Important Notes:

  • Please activate chaos vehicles plugin.
  • If your wheels are not mesh separate from the body, the wheel meshes will not grow. But you can still use many modes such as Normal mode, drift mode, drag mode, crab mode. Because there is no need for wheel enlargement in these modes.
  • Sample modes are available in this asset. We are not responsible for sample mods. Sample mods are prepared to show what you can do with this asset. The main focus of this asset is that you can do technical customization of your car and create your own mods. And you can easily switch between these modes you create.
  • This asset only works on chaos based vehicles.
